content.text: Tkak biair ldf,l n¨rd, flfkla ysáhd' fï n¨rd,  nv.sks fj,d lEu fydhdf.k yeu;eku weúof.k .shd'
fufyu hkfldg fuhdg yïnqkd uia lÜgla' n¨rd,g yßu i;=gqhs' thd uia lgqj;a láka ymdf.k wdmyq f.or tkak mgka .;a;d'
thdf.a f.org hk mdfra .x.djla ;sínd' thd .x.dfjka tf.dv fjkak md,u Èf.a .shd' fukak uia lgqjla láka ymd.;a; n¨rd, flfkla j;=r we;=,g fj,d fuhd Èyd n,df.k bkakjd'
tA ;snqfka thdf.u fyjke,a, lsh,d n¨rd,g f;arefka kE' thdg j;=fra bkak n¨rd,f.a uia lgqj;a .kak ´k Wkd' b;ska n¨rd, yhsfhka nqrdf.k j;=rg mekakd'
yßu jefâ ;uhs' n¨rd, láka ymdf.k ysgmq uia lgqj;a j;=rg jeá,d .yf.k .shd' j;=fra ysáh n¨rd,;a kE' uia lgqj;a kE' n¨rd, yßu ÿflka j;=frka f.dvg wdjd'
thd wdfhu ÿlska nv.skafkka hkak .shd' fmakjd fkao' ;Kaydj jeä Wkdu fudllao fjkafka lsh,d'
